11#ifndef CALL_AUDIO_SENDER_H_
12#define CALL_AUDIO_SENDER_H_
13
14#include <memory>
15
16#include "api/audio/audio_frame.h"
17
18namespace webrtc {
19
20class AudioSender {
21 public:
22 // Encode and send audio.
23 virtual void SendAudioData(std::unique_ptr<AudioFrame> audio_frame) = 0;
24
25 virtual ~AudioSender() = default;
26};
27
28} // namespace webrtc
29
30#endif // CALL_AUDIO_SENDER_H_
